name: The Brave Little Puppy
description:
Summary:

Help the Brave Little Puppy escape from the iCorps animal testing facility and return to his owner. And remember to always follow the light.

This game was based on Dan Clarke's She. case for the A Game By Its Cover game jam. It was created using the PIXI JS library.

This game has memory problems and was only tested in Firefox and Chrome. :)

Controls:

  • Arrow keys - movement
  • Space Bar - shoot
  • 'p' key - restart level

Team:

Art

  • Kristina Balay

Programming

  • Jason Kallman
  • Joe Lee
  • Melynda Lindhorst
  • Sarah Ripley
